title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

awardsHtml:
3 wins & 4 nominations

Behind the Voice Actors Awards

2012 Nominee BTVA Anime Voice Acting Award
Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Title in a Supporting Role
John Swasey (As the voice of "Van Hohenheim".)
2012 Nominee BTVA Anime Voice Acting Award
Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Title in a Supporting Role
Travis Willingham (As the voice of "Roy Mustang".)
2012 Nominee BTVA Anime Voice Acting Award
Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Title in a Supporting Role
Wendy Powell (As the voice of "Envy".)
2012 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Title in a Supporting Role
Travis Willingham (As the voice of "Roy Mustang".)
2012 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Title in a Supporting Role
Wendy Powell (As the voice of "Envy".)
